[b][color=white]Discord Rules In-Coming[/color][/b]
Members are required to authorize and verify their Discords to advertise their Discord IDs in any post or profile. Failing to do so will result in a warning. You can expect new Discord based rules over the next week. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6092225]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093164][color=#FFFFFF]Quickly Loved Goal Award[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
A brand-new award has been added to the website. The award has been added to the award goals, this means anyone can earn the award. The award is called the Quickly Loved award and you can get it by obtaining 100 quick loves from your own posts. The 100 quick loves have to be from 100 different members on the site so that means you can't get your friend to just quick love you over and over again.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6092225][color=#FFFFFF]Discord Rules In-Coming[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
In the last edition, we mentioned to you that there was a big new feature added to the website which attached discord with Hack Forums. Since this update, Omniscient has been working on some strict rules. These rules are intended to make everything safer and more sure to keep everyone who is using discord and the site worry-free at most times.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6090742][color=#FFFFFF]Twitch Streamer Dr Disrespect Banned[/color][/url] - [mention=3104967]
A famous twitch streamer known as DR. Disrespect has sadly been banned from twitch this week. The reasoning behind the ban is not really well known but a lot of people have been coming up with some ideas behind the ban reason. Some of them are quite funny and some are superb suggestions behind the real ban reason. The streamers sponsors have started pulling from his work so could this be the end of him?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6091232][color=#FFFFFF]BLM protestor opens fire into crowd of BLM supporters, gets arrested.[/color][/url] - [mention=4204275]
A Black Lives Matter protestor has been arrested for opening fire at a crowd of supporters during one of the protests, officers cleared the park since they needed to secure the entire area so homicide detectives can conduct an investigation. Steven Nelson Lopez has been arrested for murder said by one of the officers. The shooter has stated that they are a member of the movement.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093211][color=#FFFFFF]The time I shut a Karen up[/color][/url] - [mention=113705]
We all know what a Karen is right? Well if you don't then you need to learn what one is to understand what is going on here. But if you do know what a Karen is then this story is for you! A member known as php has shared their time they shut down a Karen. The story is pretty good and really needs to be read from the thread to get the full story, so we won't spoil the story.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6080941][color=#FFFFFF]What is the first video game you remember playing?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
Video games, we all have played a game or two in our time, but we have all started with a game that may not have been your favorite game of all time but your first game you ever played stays in your mind for life. flavoral has made his way back into the news with this brilliant thread talking about what your first ever game was that you played. Some people have come out with some very unheard of games and some have mentioned some ancient classics.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6092887][color=#FFFFFF]Amazing real life pixel version of a Minecraft painting[/color][/url] - [mention=777]
This thread isn't as much of an entertaining thread as it should be, but we do think it should be here anyway. Cooligan was on Reddit and found that in his feed he had stumbled across a very nice bit of artwork that took a very long time. Someone has recreated the skull painting from Minecraft in real life and the amount of detail that has gone into this painting to get the painting so correct must have taken a very long time. Make sure you have a look for yourself its worth your time.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093219][color=#FFFFFF]$10 BTC! | QUICK LOVE to enter![/color][/url] - [mention=4667696]
Are you looking to get some free bitcoins? Well, look no more because a member known currently as Snyke is giving everyone a chance at winning $10 Bitcoin in their contest. All you have to do is post in the thread and give them a quick love and you could be the winner!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6092856][color=#FFFFFF]$50 BTC/ 2 Winners/ $25 Each/ Post to enter[/color][/url] - [mention=2121167]
Shoto Todoroki has announced that it's their turn to give back to the community by giving people on the site a small giveaway. You can win two different prizes from their giveaway. First place gets $25 bitcoin & the second place prize is $25 donation award. So if you are interested in getting a chance at winning some bitcoin or an award for your Hack Forums awards bar then you should check this thread out for yourself.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Dr. Stone Anime's 2nd Season Teaser Previews 'Stone Wars' Arc[/color][/b]
A teaser [url=https://youtu.be/pNKxaV3BNvs]video[/url] was uploaded to YouTube, previewing the second season of Dr. Stone. The second season will take place during the "stone wars" arc of the story. The second season will air sometime in January of 2021. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-02/dr-stone-anime-2nd-season-teaser-previews-stone-wars-arc/.161371]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Funimation Expands Streaming Service to Mexico, Brazil This Fall[/color][/b]
If you live in Mexico or Brazil, you will soon be able to have access to the Funimation streaming service. Currently, the service is only available in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Ireland. Additionally, the Oceania version, AnimeLab, which is available for Australia and New Zealand consumers. Now, coming this fall of 2020, Mexico and Brazil will be part of the list of places that can use the service! Furthermore, Spanish and Portuguese subtitles will be available. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-03/funimation-expands-streaming-service-to-mexico-brazil-this-fall/.161419]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fire Force Anime's 2nd Season Listed with 24 Episodes[/color][/b]
The second season of Fire Force has just confirmed that there will be 24 episodes in the upcoming anime that will be airing in the summer 2020 season, which starts July 4. Additionally, the website of the anime announced Blu-ray discs will be released in the future too, and within those BRD (Blue-ray discs), there will be six additional episodes. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/daily-briefs/2020-07-03/fire-force-anime-2nd-season-listed-with-24-episodes/.161417]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Mangamo Manga App Plans Android Version, Territorial Availability Expansion[/color][/b]
Mangamo is an application that was in April of this year. It was created by a collaboration of the companies Hulu, Crunchyroll, Netflix, and Viz. The app provided a legal way to read the licensed manga. The service is not free, and a fee of $4.99 a month is the cost of a subscription. Currently, the application is only available on the Apple iOS store. However, there will be an Android application available soon. The scheduled date has been set for "the next following weeks or months." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-03/mangamo-manga-app-plans-android-version-territorial-availability-expansion/.161422]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Tokyo One Piece Tower Attraction Closes Down on July 31[/color][/b]
In 2015, the One Piece franchise opened up a small theme park inside of the Tokyo Tower. Inside the theme park were several lifesize statues of the characters from the anime. Additionally, props from the show were also made into lifesize. You were able to see your favorite characters, but there was a shop with One Piece merchandise, as well as a food station where you could purchase food-related to the anime. Sadly, this theme park will be closing at the end of July. The reasoning of its closure has to do with the COVID-19 epidemic. Due to the theme park being indoors and the possibility that the theme park's quality will decrease, the One Piece franchise believes it is best to close it down. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-03/tokyo-one-piece-tower-attraction-closes-down-on-july-31/.161427]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Funimation, Aniplex Screen Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Film in N. American Theaters[/color][/b]
Good news for those interested in seeing the brand new movie in the Demon Slayer series, "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Movie: Mugen Train." Funimation Films announced recently during an event they hosted, FunimationCon 2020, on July 3. There is no set date on when the movie will be released in North American theatres, but what we do know is that Funimation will be working with Aniplex of America to get the movie distributed to various theatres throughout the US. The film will air in Japan in late October. This means that the movie will most likely come to North America in the middle of 2021 or later. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-03/funimation-aniplex-screen-demon-slayer-kimetsu-no-yaiba-film-in-n-american-theaters/.161418]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]
